message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 60-40 split is more fair, with me getting the larger share this time. Let's see if you agree!
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Considering the inflation, you should be happy with 35%!
I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway.  Let's split it 45/55. This is a fair deal considering the inflation.
You're running out of time, Bob! Inflation is eating away at your share. Take this offer before it's too late!
